title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7802.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7802.6 - Hours for public inspection and copying

State Regulations

The State Energy Office shall accept requests for records
and produce records Monday through Friday, during regular business hours, which
are 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7802.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
